description: I love this app as far as learning Hiragana and Katakana I do not think there is a better app. The only thing that could be added could be the sound of the kana, but that isn't the point of the app. I wish the authors made this for Kanji and by Japans required grade levels.
summary: Fantastic App! Ultra lightweight and multiple ways to test

description: the Katakana for "n" is set for the incorrect response of "so". some of these are straight up wrong and need to be corrected
I cannot insall this app in ubuntu 20.04 LTS (Focal Fossa).
para aprender los Katanas y Hiraganas la recomiendo
